Package gameview.sView

Provides the classes necessary for the start state: Main menu, start new game, player configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISPlayer
    The SPlayer Interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SGameModePanel
    This is the panel which is shown after pressing "new game" in the start menu.
    SGMapSettingPanel
    A panel to display a map Preview and infos about the ticket types and the max figure count.
    SMenuPanel
    The first panel.
    SPlayer
    This class is an container for the player settings.
    SPlayerPanel
    A panel to configure a specific player.
    SPlayerSettingPanel
    Within this panel there are the configurations for each player.
    SState
    This is the top class for the "SState".

Package gameview.sView Description

Provides the classes necessary for the start state: Main menu, start new game, player configuration.
